name: Drift Ball
description:
Your goal is to find all eight checkpoints. you control a friction-less ball through hallways and obstacles. you bounce right off every wall you hit, and to make matters worse, you only have a limited amount of control for each direction.

Think you're up for the challenge?

plan your route through the labyrinth to find the eight checkpoints as fast as you can, there's no right or wrong way, just be sure not to run out of control!
